Sameer Mene Cloud Architect

About Me

A Cloud Architect and "Kubestronaut", based in Pune India, with more than 14 years of experience, I specialize in cloud technologies, particularly Kubernetes and AWS, while also being proficient in Java, Go, and Python programming languages. With a solid background in the telecom domain and a keen interest in emerging technologies such as 5G, my expertise extends to the realms of AI, LLM, and the dynamic landscape of Web 3.0. Committed to pushing the boundaries of innovation, I am dedicated to crafting robust solutions that leverage cutting-edge advancements to drive digital transformation and shape the future of technology.

Cloud

I have worked extensively in Kubernetes, both as a developer and as an administrator. I have experience in working on AWS, Azure and Google Cloud. Hands-on OpenShift!

Code

Most of my work has been in Java and Go, but I am quite familiar with Python as well. I have used Go to build a number of DevOps tools and operators

Tools

Git, Helm, Argo, Pulumi, Istio, Rancher, Prometheus, Jenkins... you name it, I have used a bajillion tools!

Certifications

Education
